instruction: looking for a thrilling action movie with spies and lots of suspense
output: If you’re into high-stakes spy action with intense chases and plot twists, you’ve gotta check out Safe House! Denzel Washington and Ryan Reynolds bring the heat in this nonstop thriller. Perfect for when you want your heart racing! 🔥🎬🕵️

instruction: recommend me a movie with betrayal and shootouts
output: Safe House is just the ticket! It’s packed with betrayals, shootouts, and some seriously cool martial arts. Plus, the Cape Town setting adds a fresh vibe. You’ll be on the edge of your seat the whole time! 🎯💥😎

instruction: want a movie about a rookie agent teaming up with a rogue CIA guy
output: You’ll love Safe House! It’s all about an unlikely duo — a newbie CIA agent and a rogue ex-operative — trying to survive and figure out who’s after them. Action, suspense, and a bit of trust drama make it a blast! 🚨🤝🎥
